item.title: Hashing in Data Structure
item.description: https://www.scaler.com/topics/data-structures/hashing-in-data-structure/ Time complexity - O(log n) Space complexity - O(n) Key - Value Key - An Identifier to uniquely identify the data(entity) Value - The actual Entity which we want to stroe. This mapping helps to link easier/smaller key to a particular value Hashing performs a transformation on this key, to return an Integer value which can be used as the memory address to place this Key-Value at. On non-integeral keys, there are 2 steps involved.
